experience.description: Designed, developed, and deployed cloud-native backend services and scalable applications. Built RESTful APIs, GraphQL endpoints, and microservices using Node.js, Express, Python. Implemented secure authentication with RBAC/JWT via Auth0. Delivered cross-border e-commerce platform with 20% faster order processing and fully automated logistics workflow.
achievements: Built RESTful APIs, GraphQL endpoints, and microservices using Node.js, Express, Python
Integrated Google APIs and OpenAI for enhanced functionality
Implemented secure authentication with RBAC/JWT via Auth0
Developed React dashboards with Mantine UI and Redux
Implemented RabbitMQ messaging and Redis caching
Containerized services with Docker and deployed on Azure & Choreo WSO2
Set up CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and NGINX load balancing
Achieved 20% faster order processing and fully automated logistics workflow

experience.description: Comprehensive training program focusing on full-stack development, modern web technologies, and software engineering best practices.
achievements: Learned modern web technologies and frameworks
Built multiple projects using React, Node.js, and databases
